channel.title: dhclient on MD98 page
channel.description: Recent content in dhclient on MD98 page

item.title: Wifi commands
item.description: Wifi Adapter 찾기 iw dev Adapter status ip link show wlp2s0 Adapter Start ip link set wlp2s0 up When Operation fail because of rfkill $rfkill list $sudo rfkill unblock wifi Wifi Adapter interface check iw wlp2s0 link Wifi Scan iw wlp2s0 scan Public Wifi Connect sudo iw dev wlp2s0 connect iptime WPA/WPA2 Wifi Connect $ sudo wpa_passphrase ${SSID} > wpa_supplicant.
